com.amazonaws.util

Class BinaryUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.util.BinaryUtils

  • public class BinaryUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for encoding and decoding binary data to and from different forms.

      • copyAllBytesFrom

        public static byte[] copyAllBytesFrom(java.nio.ByteBuffer bb)
        Parameters:
        bb - the byte buffer.
        Returns:
        a copy of all the bytes from the given ByteBuffer, from the beginning to the buffer's limit; or null if the input is null.

        The internal states of the given byte buffer will be restored when this method completes execution.

        When handling ByteBuffer from user's input, it's typical to call the #copyBytesFrom(ByteBuffer) instead of copyAllBytesFrom(ByteBuffer) so as to account for the position of the input ByteBuffer. The opposite is typically true, however, when handling ByteBuffer from within the unmarshallers of the low-level clients.
